roleset.name: squeeze tightly to cause pain
roleset.note: PINCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pinch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 20-1 and 10.5, Framenet entries Manipulation and Theft. (from pinch.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: touched with, if separate from agent

example.name: transitive passive
example.text: A BMA spokesman said ``runaway medical costs'' have made health insurance ``a significant challenge,'' and margins-1 also have been pinched [*-1] by changes in the mix of life-insurance products consumers now demand.
example.arg: by changes in the mix of life-insurance products consumers now demand

example.name: intransitive
example.text: [The imposition of austerity measures, starting last October,]-1 already had begun [*-1]to pinch when the massacre in Tiananmen Square on June 4 and subsequent events tugged the belt far tighter.
example.arg: when the massacre in Tiananmen Square on June 4 and subsequent events tugged the belt far tighter

example.name: semi-idiomatic
example.text: The deposits came from savings kept in a Tupperware breadbox; he-2 saved $47,000 in 1974-81 by [*-2] living with family members and pinching pennies and $45,000 of secret gifts from his remorseful father, who had abandoned the family in 1955.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary pinched John's toes with a vise-grip.

roleset.name: slangy steal
roleset.note: PINCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pinch' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 20-1 and 10.5, Framenet entries Manipulation and Theft. (from pinch.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: ... and, what PASOK's cut was from the $210 million [0] Mr. Koskotas pinched [*T*-2].

roleset.name: be miserly; avoid spending money

mappings.target: (A / refuse-01 :arg0 (n / NARG0) :arg1 (x / spend-01 :arg0 n :arg1 (B / money :poss n)))

roleset.note: PINCH-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. (from pinch.03-v)

example.name: pinch pennies
example.text: Why-1 should we pinch pennies all the time * just to spend our money on something like that *T*-1?
example.arg: * just to spend our money on something like that

roleset.name: arrest or capture
roleset.note: PINCH-V NOTES: Frame created by Tim during MWE work

example.name: pinch pennies
example.text: Vinny got pinched for selling counterfeit $2 bills
